title: Coming of Age
description: Sometimes love sneaks up on you. Sometimes it takes you down a path you are eager to follow, and others it sends your life careening out of control to places you never wanted to go.When Olivia Warren meets Max Clearman, a young man just turning eighteen, she has no intention of getting personally involved with him. She has no intention of being attracted to him and certainly does not intend to fall in love with him. She has plans and those plans don't include falling for someone ten years her junior.What is it they say about the best laid plans?Sometimes love sneaks up on you, and takes you down a path you never intended to follow.
author: Ciana Stone
